sentences: Tämä on tavallinen tapa tehdä asioita Suomessa.
context: In Finnish, 'tavallinen' is an adjective that means ordinary, normal, common, or regular. It's used to describe something that is typical, usual, or not special in any way. The word follows standard Finnish adjective conjugation patterns and can be modified for gender (tavallinen/tavallinen/tavallinen) and number (tavalliset for plural).
